name: simd_char64
desc: A vector of sixty-four 8-bit signed integer elements.

items.name: func simd_make_char64(simd_char2) -> simd_char64
items.desc: Returns a new vector from the specified two-element vector, and other elements set to zero.

items.name: func simd_make_char64(simd_char3) -> simd_char64
items.desc: Returns a new vector from the specified three-element vector, and other elements set to zero.

items.name: func simd_make_char64(simd_char4) -> simd_char64
items.desc: Returns a new vector from the specified four-element vector, and other elements set to zero.

items.name: func simd_make_char64(simd_char8) -> simd_char64
items.desc: Returns a new vector from the specified eight-element vector, and other elements set to zero.

items.name: func simd_make_char64(simd_char16) -> simd_char64
items.desc: Returns a new vector from the specified sixteen-element vector, and other elements set to zero.

items.name: func simd_make_char64(simd_char32) -> simd_char64
items.desc: Returns a new vector from the specified thirty two-element vector, and other elements set to zero.

items.name: func simd_make_char64(simd_char64) -> simd_char64
items.desc: Returns a new vector from the specified vector.

items.name: func simd_make_char64(simd_char32, simd_char32) -> simd_char64
items.desc: Returns a new vector from the specified vectors.

items.name: func simd_make_char64_undef(simd_char2) -> simd_char64
items.desc: Returns a new vector from the specified two-element vector, and other elements undefined.

items.name: func simd_make_char64_undef(simd_char3) -> simd_char64
items.desc: Returns a new vector from the specified three-element vector, and other elements undefined.

items.name: func simd_make_char64_undef(simd_char4) -> simd_char64
items.desc: Returns a new vector from the specified four-element vector, and other elements undefined.

items.name: func simd_make_char64_undef(simd_char8) -> simd_char64
items.desc: Returns a new vector from the specified eight-element vector, and other elements undefined.

items.name: func simd_make_char64_undef(simd_char16) -> simd_char64
items.desc: Returns a new vector from the specified sixteen-element vector, and other elements undefined.

items.name: func simd_make_char64_undef(simd_char32) -> simd_char64
items.desc: Returns a new vector from the specified thirty two-element vector, and other elements undefined.

items.name: func simd_make_char64(CChar) -> simd_char64
items.desc: Returns a new vector with the first element set to a scalar value, and other elements set to zero.

items.name: func simd_make_char64_undef(CChar) -> simd_char64
items.desc: Returns a new vector with the first element set to a scalar value, and other elements undefined.

items.name: func simd_abs(simd_char64) -> simd_char64
items.desc: Returns the absolute value of each element in a vector.

items.name: func simd_clamp(simd_char64, simd_char64, simd_char64) -> simd_char64
items.desc: Returns each element in a vector clamped to a specified range.

items.name: func simd_equal(simd_char64, simd_char64) -> simd_bool
items.desc: Returns true if every element in a vector is exactly equal to the corresponding element in a second vector, and otherwise returns false.

items.name: func simd_reduce_min(simd_char64) -> CChar
items.desc: Returns the miniumum value in a vector.

items.name: func simd_reduce_max(simd_char64) -> CChar
items.desc: Returns the maximum value in a vector.

items.name: func simd_reduce_add(simd_char64) -> CChar
items.desc: Returns the sum of all elements in a vector.

items.name: func simd_bitselect(simd_char64, simd_char64, simd_char64) -> simd_char64
items.desc: Returns a vector that contains elements from either the first or second parameter, based on the corresponding element in the third parameter.

items.name: func simd_min(simd_char64, simd_char64) -> simd_char64
items.desc: Returns the minimum value of each element in a vector.

items.name: func simd_max(simd_char64, simd_char64) -> simd_char64
items.desc: Returns the maximum value of each element in a vector.
